A11y Style Guide

  • 1Components
  • 2Icons
  • 3Colors
  • 4Type

Colors

All Sass color variables prefixed with $color-. This makes it easy to figure out what a variable is for later.

Primary

$color-cherry
#ec1c24
$color-ruby
#a51323
$color-sea-glass
#4083ae

Black, White, Grays

$color-black
#000
$color-midnight
#464646
$color-manatee
#888b8d
$color-silver
#bbb
$color-alto
#ddd
$color-gallery
#eee
$color-alabaster
#f7f7f7
$color-white
#FFF
